channel.title: Paula Deen on Brayden's Recipes
channel.description: Recent content in Paula Deen on Brayden's Recipes

item.title: Spinach and Bacon Quiche
item.description: Note Can replace ingredients for a green chile variant using the same cooking instructions: Swap cheddar for swiss Use green chile instead of spinach Omit the bacon (optional) Ingredients 6 large eggs, beaten 1 1/2 cups heavy cream Salt and pepper 2 cups chopped fresh baby spinach, packed 1 pound bacon, cooked and crumbled 1 1/2 cups shredded Swiss cheese 1 (9-inch) refrigerated pie crust, fitted to a 9-inch glass pie plate Directions Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F.
